name: game-settings-ui
description: UI for Jump Rope City Game Settings

scripts.test: npm run test:api:unit && npm run test:api:e2e && npm run test:fe:e2e
scripts.build: ./node_modules/bower/bin/bower install && npm run build:js && npm run build:less && npm run build:templates
scripts.build:js: find frontend/app/js -type f -print | grep .js$ | grep -v 'module.js'| grep -v 'spec.js' | grep -v 'controller.js' | xargs -J % ./node_modules/uglifyjs/bin/uglifyjs frontend/app/js/**/*.module.js % frontend/app/js/**/**/*.controller.js frontend/app.module.js -c -o frontend/build/app.js
scripts.build:templates: echo '' > frontend/build/templates.js && find frontend -type f -print | grep .tpl.html | xargs -n1 ./node_modules/ng-html2js/bin/ng-html2js >> frontend/build/templates.js
